The following Program Terms are available for you to review prior to consent in your registration with EXOS.

EXOS

EXOS has developed a wide range of technology products to enhance your training experience while at our facility.

Terms of Service: http://legal.teamexos.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://legal.teamexos.com/privacy-policy.html

BridgeAthletic Product

EXOS has partnered with BridgeAthletic to offer you customized, digital training programs which may provided during your experience in the EXOS facility.

Terms of Use Agreement: https://bridgeathletic.com/terms-of-use-agreement
Privacy Policy: https://bridgeathletic.com/privacy-policy

EXOS 3D Movement Quotient Powered by DARI Motion

In partnership with Scientific Analytics, EXOS has adopted the DARI Motion 3D motion capture technology to develop a 3D Movement Quotient experience which you may participate in during your time at the EXOS facility.

Privacy Policy: https://www.scientificanalytics.com/privacy/
